tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to a panic triggered by dereferencing excessively nested pointers. An attacker can exploit this by providing crafted input that causes the application to exceed the call stack or memory limits, potentially leading to a denial of service.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/samber/oops` library to the patch version.
